ygData.subject: Re: This is what I have so far on jewelry
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I ve got an idea, but it will take participation.  Perhaps we can each try combinine 3 items one time, and this way we will get a wide spread of materials.
ygData.messageBody:
>recently I tried 3 ingredient experiments though, I used cheap gems so I
>would not waste the money that I do not have :)
>I tried Silver with cheap gems, with pixie dust (I have like 20 pixie dust
>so I figured why not) I figured pixie dust would work, cause you can
>probably mix the dust into the metal but it did not work :(

I've got an idea, but it will take participation. Perhaps we can each try
combinine 3 items one time, and this way we will get a wide spread of
materials. Verant must have put 4 slots in the jewelers bag for some
reason... weapons certainly dont fit in them so try anything... I have
tried bone chips (dont combine), bat wings (dont combine), and multiple
gems (never works). I dont see what combining gems or metal with pelts
could do. I may try a rusted blackbox next... also I was wondering if
there was any way of combining coins to perhaps make a bar of metal ,i.e. 4
banks filled with 20 cp each may produce a copper bar? This doesnt really
sound valid as that many sp=8gp when they can be purchased for 5, but could
this be an untried idea? let me know!

Cogg
